Add and Update Data Relationship

POST /agents/add-edit-data-relation

Update Data relationship for agent

Example Request

Headers

apikey

Request Body

{
    "dataRelation":[
        {
        "brainID": "6180bc63c7dd291d592f3917",
        "columnName": "Column 1"
    },{
        "brainID": "6180bc63c7dd291d592f3917",
        "columnName": "Column 2"
    }
    ],
    "agentID": "6194a76fadf9f5001fcb9f79"
}
